data.name: Touhou Blooming Chaos 2 - Chara Pack 3:Yukari Yakumo/Eirin Yagokoro/Yasaka Kanako/Junko/Kazami Yuka
data.detailed_description:
First, a great thank to all those who have purchased Touhou Blooming Chaos 2, we really appreciate all of you to support us and the development of this game that we all enjoy.
Due to the huge cast of Touhou, we of course wish to bring everyone’s favorite characters into the game. However, limited by many constraints we are sorry that this is going to be a slow process.
As such, we created this series of DLCs for you to enjoy.
Character Pack 3 is all about the majesty of the elderly (Why there is a gap behind me) of Gensokyo!
This includes:
  • Yukari Yakumo
  • Eirin Yagokoro
  • Yasaka Kanako
  • Junko
  • Kazami Yuka
Today's charactersare mostly popular though...Hope you enjoy!
data.about_the_game:
First, a great thank to all those who have purchased Touhou Blooming Chaos 2, we really appreciate all of you to support us and the development of this game that we all enjoy.
Due to the huge cast of Touhou, we of course wish to bring everyone’s favorite characters into the game. However, limited by many constraints we are sorry that this is going to be a slow process.
As such, we created this series of DLCs for you to enjoy.
Character Pack 3 is all about the majesty of the elderly (Why there is a gap behind me) of Gensokyo!
This includes:
  • Yukari Yakumo
  • Eirin Yagokoro
  • Yasaka Kanako
  • Junko
  • Kazami Yuka
Today's charactersare mostly popular though...Hope you enjoy!
data.short_description: This DLC is an optional playable character pack for Touhou Blooming Chaos, including Yukari Yakumo,Eirin Yagokoro,Yasaka Kanako,Junko and Kazami Yuka. Once purchased, you may use them and all their color palettes in game immediately. Hope you enjoy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: Intel i3 / AMD r3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: Intel i3 8100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
